member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstNode
member.summary: Provides the base class for an AST node.

remarks.para: Each AST node has a single parent and optional children. The nodes may be navigated by parent to child or child to parent. When a node is created, it initially has no parent node.
AST nodes implement the visitor pattern.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstNode.Accept(ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor)
member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor for visiting this node.
member.remarks: This method is part of the visitor design pattern implementation.

member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor for visiting a child node of this node.
member.remarks: This method is part of the visitor design pattern implementation.

member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor for visiting the child nodes of this node.
member.param: The list of child nodes to visit.
member.remarks: This method is part of the visitor design pattern implementation.

member.summary: Accepts the specified visitor for visiting this node.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor
member.summary: Provides the base class for an AST node visitor.

remarks.para: This class supports the visitor pattern.
Each visitor implements a OnVisiting and an OnVisited method for each AST node type. By default the OnVisiting method returns true, while the OnVisited method does nothing.

The OnVisiting method should return true if its child nodes should be visited. If true is returned, the child nodes are visiting in order. After the child nodes are visited, the OnVisited method is called. If OnVisiting returns false, child node visits are not made and OnVisited is called directly.
Additionally, the generic method is called before any type-specific OnVisiting method is executed and the generic method is called after any type-specific OnVisited method is executed.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor.OnPostVisited(ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstNode)
member.summary: Visits the after the type-specific OnVisited method is executed.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor.OnPreVisiting(ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstNode)
member.summary: Visits the before the type-specific OnVisiting method is executed.
member.returns: true if the node and its children should be visited; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor.OnVisiting(ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.CData)
member.summary: Visits the specified type of .
member.returns: true if the node's children should be visited; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.AstVisitor.OnVisiting(ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.Ast.Comment)
member.summary: Visits the specified type of .
member.returns: true if the node's children should be visited; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Visits the specified type of .

member.summary: Visits the specified type of .
member.returns: true if the node's children should be visited; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Visits the specified type of .
member.returns: true if the node's children should be visited; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.AddSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Adds another to the existing schema set to use for IntelliPrompt support.
member.remarks: Since .NET 1.1 only supports loading of a single schema at a time, this method will behave like in .NET 1.1.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.AddSchema(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema)
member.summary: Adds another to the existing schema set to use for IntelliPrompt support.

member.summary: Adds another from a file to the existing schema set to use for IntelliPrompt support.
member.param: The path to the XSD schema file to load.
member.remarks: Since .NET 1.1 only supports loading of a single schema at a time, this method will behave like in .NET 1.1.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.ClearSchemas

member.returns: An object describing the context at the specified offset within the .

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.GetDocumentation(System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnnotated)
member.summary: Returns the XSD documentation for the specified source object, for use in quick info tips.
member.param: The source for which the documentation is being retrieved.
member.returns: The documentation that was retrieved.
member.remarks: The default implementation of this method appends the inner text of all the child nodes together, with whitespace in between. Markup formatting may be used in the documentation results.

member.name: M:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.LoadSchema(System.String)
member.summary: Clears any already-loaded schemas and loads a single to use for IntelliPrompt support.
member.remarks: This method first clears any schemas currently in use and then loads a single specified schema.

member.remarks: This method first clears any schemas currently in use and then loads a single specified schema.

member.summary: Clears any already-loaded schemas and loads a to use for IntelliPrompt support.
member.remarks: This method first clears any schemas currently in use and then loads the specified . This method is not available in .NET 1.1.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.DefaultNamespace
member.summary: Gets or sets the default namespace to use for any XML element branches that don't have an xmlns specified.
member.value: The default namespace to use for any XML element branches that don't have an xmlns specified.
member.remarks: By setting this property to a namespace, a xmlns attribute doesn't need to be set on the root element.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.DtdPath
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the folder where DTDs are located.
member.value: The path to the folder where DTDs are located.
member.remarks: This property is only used when the property is set to true. If this property is left , no explicit base path will be set for DTD loading. If this property is set, it should be the path to the folder that contains the DTDs that may be referenced.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.DtdSupportEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether DTD support is enabled.
member.value: true if DTD support is enabled.
member.remarks: When DTD support is enabled, if there is a DTD reference within the XML, it will attempt to be loaded and used for validation. Note that DTDs cannot be used to provide automated IntelliPrompt.

member.name: P:ActiproSoftware.SyntaxEditor.Addons.Xml.XmlSchemaResolver.ValidationFlags
member.summary: Gets or sets the to use when validating XML using a schema.
member.value: The to use when validating XML using a schema. The default value contains AllowXmlAttributes and ProcessIdentityConstraints.
